title: The Supermarket
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: The Supermarket uses bright pictures and two-word sentences to label products typically found at a grocery store. Students will delight in reading about a familiar place, and will be able to associate the written words with food words that they have heard many times before.
meta: bread, carts, cereal, eggs, fruits, meat, vegetables
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
Suffixes : Recognize and use the suffix -s
